column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We came for breakfast on a Sunday with our laptops to do some work (free wifi!).  We ordered breakfast sandwiches.  They were good but expensive $12 each.  The bread/roll was disappointing considering they have some great looking breads on display.  Coffee was pretty good.  Did not taste the pastries
column2: but we were already over $30 so we passed.  We sat on the two comfortable chairs near the coffee bar
column3: but we needed to charge our laptops
column5: so we had to move to the less comfortable stools by the windows.  We would have stayed a lot longer if we had been able to charge and sit in the comfy seats.  Maybe worth it for the pastries?
